EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF 1.6 Launch_Q415.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming webinar Expand Your Cloud Native Platform's Capabilities With The Newest Release of Pivotal Cloud Foundry on Thursday, November 19, 2015. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, November 19, 2015 Time: 10AM PST- 1:00PM EST Join the Session <http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1084533/BADF02F8BC6EB0B824A341447DFA9647> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via your computer speakers. {{my.Save the Date Release:default=edit me}}
Read more <http://pivotal.io/platform/press-release/go-from-idea-to-production-in-less-than-a-day> about the new features and capabilities of Pivotal Cloud Foundry. While you wait, check out our replay <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar> of The Cloud Native Journey with Matt Stine, Senior Product Manager, Spring Cloud Services for Pivotal Cloud Foundry. He reviewed how companies embracing the cloud native patterns of software delivery will survive and companies that donâ€™t - will not. Watch it now <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/the-cloud-native-journey?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-journey-webinar>!
We Look Forward to you Joining us! The Pivotal Team
